title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of visitors in millions has increased over the Year.

Number of visitors in millions is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, roughly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Number of visitors in millions about 4.5 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of visitors in millions about 2.67 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2013 to 2017.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2010.
